basics.name: Sophia Anderson
basics.label: Senior Content Strategist
basics.summary: Creative Content Strategist with 7+ years of experience crafting compelling digital content strategies and managing editorial teams. Expertise in SEO, content marketing, and brand storytelling. Proven track record of increasing engagement and driving organic traffic through strategic content initiatives.

highlights: Developed comprehensive content strategies for 10+ Fortune 500 clients
Increased organic traffic by 200% through strategic content optimization
Led team of 6 content creators and 2 SEO specialists
Implemented content measurement framework improving ROI tracking by 60%
